SetupTraits.Name: Monsters
SetupTraits.Description:
Enforcers do not flee or negotiate.
â€¢ Motivations: Enforcers are typically commanded by kin and given a set of directions to strictly follow.

SetupTraits.Name: Priority Threat
SetupTraits.Description: While fighting Enforcers, the first player character to take a turn in each round becomes the priority threat. When a new priority threat is chosen, the last one ceases to be the priority threat. Enforcers have traits that interact with the priority threat.
